venue.name: Bear and Grill Restaurants in Orange

item.description:
Start the weekend with good people and music at

 Bear & Grill - Orange 

 on Friday evening, April 27thth starting at 5:30 PM.

Happy hour on Friday is a great way to start your weekend. Come and join your friends from Party Express to unwind, catch up and ease into your weekend.  A featured part of the happy hour is an acoustic guitar performance by your event host, Tom Ferrara, who is a Party Express! member. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring a friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier!

For those who may be new to Party Express! and haven't heard Tom perform, he plays a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes everyone from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day and Collective Soul. Tom hass performed a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks.
